questions.text: When Eve and Roarke went to Dallas, what revelation about herself did Eve reveal to Roarke?
options: Her father killed her mother in front of her
The man who abused her wasn't her real father
She met Roarke's father in the hotel room
questions.explanation:
She never had a name.

	When Eve was taken to the hospital as an eight year old girl, everyone thought she was too scared to tell them her name. In truth, Eve didn't have a name until a social worker gave her one. After leaving the hotel, Roarke took Eve back to his hotel and let her shower while he went to the workout room and beat up on a punching bag.

questions.text: What motel room number did Eve tell Roarke she and her father stayed in while in Dallas?
questions.explanation:
911.

	After going to the alley, Roarke took Eve to the motel where she killed her father. Roarke used his name and power to finagle the use of the room for a few hours. Eve remembered the number of the room and much more about the night she killed her father.

questions.text: What did Peabody want to give Roarke as a thank you gift for letting her and Ian McNab vacation at one of his properties?
questions.correct: A throw made by her mother
questions.explanation:
A throw made by her mother.

	Peabody didn't know what to get the man who actually had everything so when she suggested getting her mother to make him a throw, Eve thought that was a great idea.

questions.text: How did Sam, Peabody's father, learn of Eve's childhood?
questions.correct: He saw it in her head
options: Sam overheard Roarke and Eve speaking
He woke Eve from a nightmare
questions.explanation:
He saw it in her head.

	Eve had a massive headache that Sam, an empath, offered to help her with. As he touched her forehead to take the pain away, he went too deep and saw images of her being abused as a child. Eve freaked out and asked Sam not to tell anyone. When Roarke found out, he wanted Sam to leave their home, but Eve told him not to do that. Sam promised never to say anything about Eve's childhood.

questions.text: Where did Eve and Roarke spend the first week of their two week vacation?
questions.explanation:
Mexico.

	At the end of "Seduction In Death", Eve asked Roarke if they could start their two week vacation as soon as she finished the paperwork on her case. He agreed. When "Reunion In Death" began, Eve and Roarke had just gotten home from spending a week in Mexico and a week on a private island. When Eve opened her closet to dress for her first day back at work, she found more clothes in her closet then were in there when she left.

questions.text: What Disney cartoon character also shared a name with Walter Pettibone's much younger wife?
questions.explanation:
Bambi.

	Bambi was the second wife of Walter Pettibone. Walter was killed at his surprise birthday party when he ingested poison. After interviewing Bambi, Eve said she had the "mental capacity of broccoli".

questions.text: What was the painting of that Eve gave to Roarke?
questions.explanation:
Their wedding day.

	Eve kept telling Roarke she didn't forget their anniversary and after he gave her two gifts, she went out and brought back the painting she had done from their wedding disc. The scene was moments before they kissed for the first time as man and wife. It brought tears to Roarke's eyes.

questions.text: Eve gave Peabody her first solo case. Was Peabody able to solve the case?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	After coming back from vacation, Eve found her office had been cleaned, painted, and her chocolate stash gone. With no new cases on the books, Eve pulled a cold case and gave it to Peabody to solve. Peabody solved the murder case and Eve had a commendation put into her file for working the solo case and the case with Eve at the same time.

questions.text: What special event did Eve and Roarke celebrate in "Reunion In Death"?
options: Anniversary of the first time they met
questions.explanation:
First anniversary.

	Roarke set up the hologram room so he and Eve could spend their first anniversary in Paris where they spent their honeymoon. Eve kept telling Roarke she didn't forget their anniversary.

questions.text: Eve went to see Doctor Mira at her home and met Doctor Mira's husband. What was his name?
questions.explanation:
Dennis.

	Eve went to see Doctor Mira about the case she was working on, but thought better of it before the front door opened. Eve was introduced to Doctor Mira's husband, Dennis, who seemed very sweet and gentle, but also forgetful.
